    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet SpecifiedAmenity_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:SpecifiedAmenity_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<SpecifiedAmenity number="1234" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Amenity description="Example String Value" name="Example String Value">
        <Code codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</Code>
    </Amenity>
</SpecifiedAmenity>

      Example JSON

      {
  "SpecifiedAmenity" : {
    "number" : 1234,
    "Amenity" : {
      "@type" : "Amenity",
      "name" : "Example String Value",
      "description" : "Example String Value",
      "Code" : {
        "value" : "Example String Value",
        "codeContext" : "Example String Value",
        "description" : "Example String Value"
      }
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Amenity
        Amentities and services available with a product(either included in the price of the tee time or available for an extra fee), such as power carts. Note, includes pricing.
        Details
        Type Amenity
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        number
        The number of requested acillary products (amenities)
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
